description:
A super-soft collar that you just want to snuggle into on chilly days. Think sweatshirt made from plush high-pile Shearling fleece, add the coziest collar you’ve ever scrunched into, and that’s the Pecora. Whether you’re exploring pumpkin patches or taking in the changing leaves, this sweater will keep you toasty.

  • Polartec® Thermal Pro® shearling fleece holds onto warmth and wicks away moisture
  • DriTech material finish lets this fleece dry even faster than regular fleece
  • High funnel-neck collar provides scarf-like warmth
  • Drawcord at the waist and elasticised cuffs help keep the warm air in and the cold air out
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Indyeva Pecora Sweater - Women's
